long_description: Designed for downhill and freeriding, these crankbrothers 5050 2 platform pedals feature dual-material construction and fully customizable traction. Pedal bodies are made of aluminum and polycarbonate and offer a wide platform for extra stability underfoot. Each of the twenty 10mm traction pins (per pedal) are adjustable for a fully customizable amount of traction. Forged chromoly steel spindle offers stout strength; outer cartridge bearing and inner bushing ensure smooth spinning. Note: polycarbonate is incompatible with anaerobic liquids; do NOT use non-polycarbonate approved thread locking solvent on any part of this pedal as cracking could occur. Loctite 380 or 401 (not included) is approved for use on all bolts and pins on these crankbrothers 5050 2 pedals.
